targets.expr: sum(rate(request_rest_status_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource", http_status=~"$http_status" }[2m]))  by (http_status) > 0

sum(rate(request_rest_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource"} [2m])) by (job) / sum(rate(request_rest_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource"} [2m])) by (job)
kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{ namespace="$namespace", deployment=~"$job"   }
kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{ namespace="$namespace", deployment=~"$job" }
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (pod)
max(sum(jvm_memory_committed_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (pod))
max(sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (pod))

panels.description: If the CPU Usage is not shown, please check the query in the panel "CPU Usage" in the dashboard "General/Kubernetes/Compute Resources/Pod" to see whether "sum_rate" is used instead of "sum_irate".  If it is the case, please update sum_irate in Query A in this panel to sum_rate.

targets.expr: max( cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_requests {namespace="commerce", pod=~"$pod"})
max( cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits {namespace="commerce", pod=~"$pod"})

panels.title: CPU Usage

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="query-app"}[5m])) by (pod) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="query-app"}[5m])) by (pod)
max(threadpool_maximum_pool_size{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", pool="Default_Executor" })
sum( threadpool_active_pool_size{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod",pool="Default_Executor"} ) by ( pod )
sum( rate(java_logging_messages_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod" }[2m]) ) by ( level )
sum( rate(java_logging_messages_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", level=~"SEVERE|WARNING"}[2m]) ) by ( pod )
sum( rate(java_logging_messages_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", level="TRACE"}[2m]) ) by ( pod )

panels.title: Rate of Trace Messages by Pod

targets.expr: sum(rate(request_rest_status_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource", http_status=~"$http_status"}[2m]))
sum(rate(request_rest_status_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource", http_status=~"$http_status" }[2m]))  by (http_status)
sum(rate(request_rest_status_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource", http_status=~"$http_status"}[2m]))  by (resource)

sum(rate(request_rest_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource"} [2m]))  by (pod)  / sum(rate(request_rest_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource"} [2m])) by (pod)

sum(rate(request_rest_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource"} [2m])) by (resource,transaction)   / sum(rate(request_rest_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource"} [2m])) by (resource,transaction) > 0

sum(rate(request_rest_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource"} [2m]))  by (resource,transaction) / sum(rate(request_rest_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource"} [2m])) by (resource,transaction) > 0
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(request_rest_seconds_bucket{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource" }[2m])) by (resource,transaction,le)) > 0
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(request_rest_seconds_bucket{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource" }[2m])) by (resource,transaction,le)) > 0
sum(rate(request_rest_status_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource", cache ="hit" }[2m]))  by ( resource) > 0
sum(rate(request_rest_status_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", resource=~"$resource", cache ="miss" }[2m]))  by ( resource) > 0
max(hcl_concurrency_limiter_capacity{name="RestHighLevelClientHelper.request", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"})
sum(hcl_concurrency_limiter_threads_using{ name="RestHighLevelClientHelper.request", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod)
max(hcl_concurrency_limiter_max_waiters{name="RestHighLevelClientHelper.request",namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"}) < 1000
sum(hcl_concurrency_limiter_threads_waiting{ name="RestHighLevelClientHelper.request", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod)
max(hcl_concurrency_limiter_capacity{name="RestHighLevelClientHelper.call", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"})
sum(hcl_concurrency_limiter_threads_using{ name="RestHighLevelClientHelper.call", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod)
max(hcl_concurrency_limiter_max_waiters{name="RestHighLevelClientHelper.call",namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"}) < 1000
sum(hcl_concurrency_limiter_threads_waiting{ name="RestHighLevelClientHelper.call", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod)
sum( service_active_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod" } ) by ( exported_service )
sum(rate(request_backend_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[2m])) by (host)

sum(rate(request_backend_seconds_sum{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m]))  by (host) / sum(rate(request_backend_seconds_count{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod"} [2m])) by (host)
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(request_backend_seconds_bucket{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod" }[2m])) by (host,le))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(request_backend_seconds_bucket{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod" }[2m])) by (host,le))
